title: Bug 117981: Item cannot be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description:
Description: Any item cannot be selected at the first time in library outline view.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label in library file.
2. Select the label item in library outline view.
3.
OB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the selection is not registered.
EB: The item should be selectable and register the selection in the library outline view when selected for the first time.
SR:
Follow these steps to reproduce the issue:
1. Add a label to the library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view.
4. Verify if the selection is not registered.
